title: #38 Undo, Undo, Undo
description:
On this week's episode of Reply All, we do a Yes Yes No with Alix Spiegel and Lulu Miller of NPR's Invisibilia, and we discuss the one message you've sent across the internet you wish you could take back.
Email us a voice memo about the things you wish you could most undo at undo@gimletmedia.com
Subscribe to Invisibilia: www.npr.org/programs/invisibilia/
Watch us in Cast Party: www.castparty.org
Follow Max Silvestri: www.twitter.com/maxsilvestri
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
